     5  
     6  package ev
     7  
     8  import (
     9  	"context"
    10  	"errors"
    11  
    12  	"github.com/haraldrudell/parl"
    13  	"github.com/haraldrudell/parl/error116"
    14  )
    15  
    16  // CalleeContext provides for a goroutine to communicate with the caller
    17  type CalleeContext struct {
    18  	context.Context
    19  	gID     GoID
    20  	name    string
    21  	eventTx chan<- Event
    22  }
    23  
    24  var _ Callee = &CalleeContext{}
    25  
    26  // NewCallee provides a Calle implementation, data used by a managed goroutine
    27  func NewCallee(name string, gID GoID, eventTx chan<- Event, ctx0 context.Context) (ctx Callee) {
    28  	ctx = &CalleeContext{Context: ctx0, gID: gID, name: name, eventTx: eventTx}
    29  	return
    30  }
    31  
    32  func (ctx *CalleeContext) Success() {
    33  	ctx.eventTx <- NewExitEvent(nil, ctx.gID)
    34  }
    35  
    36  func (ctx *CalleeContext) Failure(err error) {
    37  	if err == nil {
    38  		err = error116.New("Failure without errors")
    39  	}
    40  	evt := NewExitEvent(err, ctx.gID)
    41  	exitEvent := evt.(*ExitEvent)
    42  	if errors.Is(err, context.Canceled) {
    43  		exitEvent.IsCancel = true
    44  	}
    45  	if errors.Is(err, context.DeadlineExceeded) {
    46  		exitEvent.IsTimeout = true
    47  	}
    48  	ctx.eventTx <- evt
    49  }
    50  
    51  func (ctx *CalleeContext) Result(errp *error) {
    52  	ctx.ResultV(errp, recover())
    53  }
    54  
    55  func (ctx *CalleeContext) ResultV(errp *error, recoverValue interface{}) {
    56  	var err error
    57  
    58  	// collect errp
    59  	if errp != nil {
    60  		err = *errp
    61  	}
    62  
    63  	// collect recoverValue, update *errp
    64  	if recoverValue != nil {
    65  		e := parl.EnsureError(recoverValue)
    66  		parl.Errorf("Recover in Result for goroutine: %s: %w", ctx.name, recoverValue)
    67  		err = error116.AppendError(err, e)
    68  		if errp != nil && err != *errp {
    69  			*errp = err
    70  		}
    71  	}
    72  
    73  	// forward result
    74  	if err == nil {
    75  		ctx.Success()
    76  	} else {
    77  		ctx.Failure(err)
    78  	}
    79  }
    80  
    81  func (ctx *CalleeContext) Thread() (name string, gID GoID) {
    82  	name = ctx.name
    83  	gID = ctx.gID
    84  	return
    85  }
    86  
    87  // Send allows a groutine to send any event
    88  func (ctx *CalleeContext) Send(payload interface{}) {
    89  	ctx.eventTx <- NewDataEvent(ctx.gID, payload)
    90  }
    91
